backend/main.mo: Actor manages user profiles, settings, and conversation history with role‑based access control and language/explanation-level validation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains short summaries of key frontend files including i18n, safety policy, clarifying questions, response templates, and chat UI.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme color variables and component styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the root React app and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component configuring theming and rendering the app layout with ChatView.
frontend/src/assistant/clarifyingQuestio: Provides logic to detect vague prompts and generate localized clarifying questions.
frontend/src/assistant/responseTemplates: Generates structured, multilingual assistant responses with sectioned templates and explanation levels.
frontend/src/assistant/safetyPolicy.ts: Defines unsafe keywords, checks prompt safety, and generates localized safety refusal messages.
frontend/src/assistant/structuredRespons: Runs safety and clarification checks on prompts before generating a structured assistant response.
frontend/src/components/about/AboutPanel: Renders the About panel with app info, supported languages, safety notes, and APK notice.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and UI state.
frontend/src/components/brand/AJ1Brand.t: Displays the AJ.1 brand logo and optional icon.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatView.ts: Manages chat UI, message history, input handling, and generating assistant responses.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageBubb: Renders user and assistant messages, including simple Markdown parsing for assistant responses.
frontend/src/components/chat/Persistence: Shows a notice when chat history is session-only for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout including header, navigation sheets, footer, and panel triggers.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Renders a settings panel allowing users to change language and explanation level, loading and saving settings via react-query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and helper functions using Internet Identity, exposing login, logout, and identity management through context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in react-query hooks for user settings, conversation history, and user profiles with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/i18n/supportedLanguages.ts: Defines the list of supported languages and provides a helper to look up display labels.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains translation dictionaries for multiple languages keyed by translation IDs.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Returns a translation function based on the active language using preloaded dictionaries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining base styles, theme variables, and dark mode color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up react-query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing) and storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, with optional persistence logic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending typography, colors, animations, and container settings with custom themes and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, requirements, and features for building the AJ.1 assistant app, including capabilities, images, and version data.
